entry.title: Ekcoscreen - Urinal Screens Blue Fresh 30 Days - 2 / Pack
entry.summary:
Vendor: Ekcoscreen
Type: Disposables
Price: 6.99

Eliminate unwanted odors from your restroom with this Janitorial Blue Fresh scented deodorized urinal screen!

If you are hoping to enhance your restaurant or bar's bathroom environment, there is no better way than with this Janitorial Blue Fresh scent deodorized urinal screen. By instantly eliminating persistent odors at their source, this deodorant urinal screen promotes a clean environment and let's your guests know that you care about every aspect of their experience in your establishment.

Blue Fresh Scent

This vinyl urinal screen emits a pleasant Blue Fresh scent to counteract the unpleasant smells often associated with bathrooms. The clean smell will help put your guests at ease without being too overpowering.

Easy to Use

To use, simply place it on the bottom of the urinal in your bathroom. It begins working immediately and offers up to 30 days of built-in deodorant protection!

Universal Shape

This urinal screen's vinyl design offers the flexibility needed to fit most urinals for the ultimate convenience. Its perforated design allows liquids to pass through while effectively providing drainage protection from unwanted substances. Plus, this screen won't flake or disintegrate like toss blocks

entry.title: JAN MAR - Health Gards Para Cherry Urinal Pucks - 12/Pack
entry.summary:
Vendor: Health Gards
Type: Disposables
Price: 16.99

Provide your guests with a freshly scented bathroom when you use this Janitorial urinal cake!

If you are hoping to enhance your restaurant or bar's bathroom environment, there is no better way than with this Janitorial urinal cake. By instantly eliminating persistent odors at their source, this deodorant urinal block promotes a clean environment and let's your guests know that you care about every aspect of their experience in your establishment.

Cherry Scent

This air-activated deodorant urinal block emits a pleasant Cherry scent to counteract the unpleasant smells often associated with bathrooms. The clean smell will help put your guests at ease without being too overpowering.

Long-Lasting

Not recommended for use in standing water, this non-paradichlorobenzene block lasts for a significant amount of time, usually between 30 and 40 days.

Easy to Use

To use, simply unwrap the urinal block and place it on the bottom of the urinal in your bathroom. It begins working as soon as it comes in contact with the air!
